title: Android Autoâ€™s new UI resurfaces ahead of the final release
content:
In September last year, we unearthed evidence of a new UI for Android Auto. The new UI, codenamed “Coolwalk,” is set to be the biggest UI overhaul for Android Auto since 2019 and is seemingly designed to reduce the number of times the user leaves the navigation mode. Now ahead of its official release, some

The post Android Auto’s new UI resurfaces ahead of the final release appeared first on xda-developers.
description: New images of Andriod Auto's major redesign have surfaced again, showcasing new design tweaks and a new screen mirroring app.
